   19: %%
   20: -module(counters_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([suite/0, all/0]).
   25: -export([basic/1, bad/1, limits/1, indep/1, write_concurrency/1,
   26:          error_info/1]).
   27: 
   28: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   29: 
   30: all() ->
   31:     [basic, bad, limits, indep, write_concurrency, error_info].
   32: 
   33: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   34:     Size = 10,
   35:     [begin
   36:          Ref = counters:new(Size,[Type]),
   37:          #{size:=Size, memory:=Memory} = counters:info(Ref),
   38:          check_memory(Type, Memory, Size),
   39:          [basic_do(Ref, Ix) || Ix <- lists:seq(1, Size)]
   40:      end
   41:      || Type <- [atomics, write_concurrency]],
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: basic_do(Ref, Ix) ->
   45:     0 = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   46:     ok = counters:add(Ref, Ix, 3),
   47:     3  = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   48:     ok = counters:add(Ref, Ix, 14),
   49:     17  = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   50:     ok = counters:add(Ref, Ix, -20),
   51:     -3  = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   52:     ok = counters:add(Ref, Ix, 100),
   53:     97 = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   54:     ok = counters:sub(Ref, Ix, 20),
   55:     77 = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   56:     ok = counters:sub(Ref, Ix, -10),
   57:     87 = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   58:     ok = counters:put(Ref, Ix, 0),
   59:     0 = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   60:     ok = counters:put(Ref, Ix, 123),
   61:     123 = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   62:     ok = counters:put(Ref, Ix, -321),
   63:     -321 = counters:get(Ref, Ix),
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: check_memory(atomics, Memory, Size) ->
   67:     {_,true} = {Memory, Memory > Size*8},
   68:     {_,true} = {Memory, Memory < Size*max_atomic_sz() + 100};
   69: check_memory(write_concurrency, Memory, Size) ->
   70:     NWords = erlang:system_info(schedulers) + 1,
   71:     {_,true} = {Memory, Memory > NWords*Size*8},
   72:     {_,true} = {Memory, Memory < NWords*(Size+7)*max_atomic_sz() + 100}.
   73: 
   74: max_atomic_sz() ->
   75:     case erlang:system_info({wordsize, external}) of
   76:         4 -> 16;
   77:         8 ->
   78:             EI = erlang:system_info(ethread_info),
   79:             case lists:keyfind("64-bit native atomics", 1, EI) of
   80:                 {_, "no", _} -> 16;
   81:                 _ -> 8
   82:             end
   83:     end.
   84: 
   85: bad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:new(-(1 bsl 64),[])),
   87:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:new(0,[])),
   88:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:new(10,[bad])),
   89:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:new(10,[atomic, bad])),
   90:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:new(10,[write_concurrency | bad])),
   91: 
   92:     {'EXIT',{system_limit,_}} = (catch counters:new(1 bsl 64,[write_concurrency])),
   93: 
   94:     Ref = counters:new(10,[]),
   95:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:get(1742, 7)),
   96:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:get(make_ref(), 7)),
   97:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:get(Ref, -1)),
   98:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:get(Ref, 0)),
   99:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:get(Ref, 11)),
  100:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:get(Ref, 7.0)),
  101:     ok.
  102: 
  103: 
  104: limits(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     limits_do(counters:new(1,[atomics])),
  106:     limits_do(counters:new(1,[write_concurrency])),
  107:     ok.
  108: 
  109: limits_do(Ref) ->
  110:     Bits = 64,
  111:     Max = (1 bsl (Bits-1)) - 1,
  112:     Min = -(1 bsl (Bits-1)),
  113: 
  114:     0 = counters:get(Ref, 1),
  115:     ok = counters:put(Ref, 1, Max),
  116:     Max = counters:get(Ref, 1),
  117:     ok = counters:add(Ref, 1, 1),
  118:     Min = counters:get(Ref, 1),
  119:     ok  = counters:sub(Ref, 1, 1),
  120:     Max = counters:get(Ref, 1),
  121:     ok = counters:put(Ref, 1, Min),
  122:     Min = counters:get(Ref, 1),
  123: 
  124:     IncrMax = (Max bsl 1) bor 1,
  125:     ok = counters:put(Ref, 1, 0),
  126:     ok = counters:add(Ref, 1, IncrMax),
  127:     -1 = counters:get(Ref, 1),
  128:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:add(Ref, 1, IncrMax+1)),
  129:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:add(Ref, 1, Min-1)),
  130:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:put(Ref, 1, Max+1)),
  131:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch counters:add(Ref, 1, Min-1)),
  132:     ok.
  133: 
  134: 
  135: %% Verify that independent workers, using different counters
  136: %% within the same array, do not interfere with each other.
  137: indep(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  138:     NScheds = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  139:     Ref = counters:new(NScheds,[write_concurrency]),
  140:     Rounds = 100,
  141:     Papa = self(),
  142:     Pids = [spawn_opt(fun () ->
  143:                                Val = I*197,
  144:                                counters:put(Ref, I, Val),
  145:                                indep_looper(Rounds, Ref, I, Val),
  146:                                Papa ! {self(), done}
  147:                        end,
  148:                       [link, {scheduler, I}])
  149:             || I <- lists:seq(1, NScheds)],
  150:     [receive {P,done} -> ok end || P <- Pids],
  151:     ok.
  152: 
  153: indep_looper(0, _, _ , _) ->
  154:     ok;
  155: indep_looper(N, Ref, I, Val0) ->
  156:     %%io:format("Val0 = ~p\n", [Val0]),
  157:     Val0 = counters:get(Ref, I),
  158:     Val1 = indep_adder(Ref, I, Val0),
  159:     indep_subber(Ref, I, Val1),
  160:     Val2 = N*7 + I,
  161:     counters:put(Ref, I, Val2),
  162:     indep_looper(N-1, Ref, I, Val2).
  163: 
  164: indep_adder(Ref, I, Val) when Val < (1 bsl 62) ->
  165:     %%io:format("adder Val = ~p\n", [Val]),
  166:     Incr = abs(Val div 2) + I + 984735,
  167:     counters:add(Ref, I, Incr),
  168:     Res = Val + Incr,
  169:     Res = counters:get(Ref, I),
  170:     indep_adder(Ref, I, Res);
  171: indep_adder(_Ref, _I, Val) ->
  172:     Val.
  173: 
  174: indep_subber(Ref, I, Val) when Val > -(1 bsl 62) ->
  175:     %%io:format("subber Val = ~p\n", [Val]),
  176:     Decr = (abs(Val div 2) + I + 725634),
  177:     counters:sub(Ref, I, Decr),
  178:     Res = Val - Decr,
  179:     Res = counters:get(Ref, I),
  180:     indep_subber(Ref, I, Res);
  181: indep_subber(_Ref, _I, Val) ->
  182:     Val.
  183: 
  184: 
  185: 
  186: %% Verify write_concurrency yields correct results.
  187: write_concurrency(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  188:     rand:seed(exs1024s),
  189:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  190:     NScheds = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  191:     Size = 100,
  192:     Ref = counters:new(Size,[write_concurrency]),
  193:     Rounds = 1000,
  194:     Papa = self(),
  195:     Pids = [spawn_opt(fun Worker() ->
  196:                               receive
  197:                                   {go, Ix, Incr} ->
  198:                                       wc_looper(Rounds, Ref, Ix, Incr),
  199:                                       Papa ! {self(), done, Rounds*Incr},
  200:                                       Worker();
  201:                                   stop ->
  202:                                       ok
  203:                               end
  204:                        end,
  205:                       [link, {scheduler, N}])
  206:             || N <- lists:seq(1, NScheds)],
  207:     [begin
  208:          Base = rand_log64(),
  209:          counters:put(Ref, Index, Base),
  210:          SendList = [{P,{go, Index, rand_log64()}} || P <- Pids],
  211:          [P ! Msg || {P,Msg} <- SendList],
  212:          Added = lists:sum([receive {P,done,Contrib} -> Contrib end || P <- Pids]),
  213:          Result = mask_sint64(Base+Added),
  214:          {_,Result} = {Result, counters:get(Ref, Index)}
  215:      end
  216:      || Index <- lists:seq(1, Size)],
  217: 
  218:     [begin unlink(P), P ! stop end || P <- Pids],
  219:     ok.
  220: 
  221: wc_looper(0, _, _, _) ->
  222:     ok;
  223: wc_looper(N, Ref, Ix, Incr) ->
  224:     counters:add(Ref, Ix, Incr),
  225:     wc_looper(N-1, Ref, Ix, Incr).
  226: 
  227: mask_sint64(X) ->
  228:     SMask = 1 bsl 63,
  229:     UMask = SMask - 1,
  230:     (X band UMask) - (X band SMask).
  231: 
  232: %% A random signed 64-bit integer
  233: %% with a uniformly distributed number of significant bits.
  234: rand_log64() ->
  235:     Uint = round(math:pow(2, rand:uniform()*63)),
  236:     case rand:uniform(2) of
  237:         1 -> -Uint;
  238:         2 -> Uint
  239:     end.
  240: 
  241: error_info(_Config) ->
  242:     Counters = counters:new(10, [write_concurrency]),
  243:     Huge = 1 bsl 64,
  244: 
  245:     L = [{add,[bad_ref, 1, 99]},
  246:          {add,[{atomics, make_ref()}, 1, 99]},
  247:          {add,[Counters, bad_index, bad_value]},
  248:          {add,[Counters, 1, Huge]},
  249:          {add,[Counters, 0, 99]},
  250:          {add,[Counters, 11, 99]},
  251: 
  252:          {get, [{atomics, make_ref()}, 1]},
  253:          {get, [Counters, 0]},
  254:          {get, [Counters, bad_index]},
  255:          {get, [Counters, 11]},
  256: 
  257:          {info, [{atomics, make_ref()}]},
  258:          {info, [abc]},
  259: 
  260:          {new, [0, []]},
  261:          {new, [11, bad_option_list]},
  262:          {new, [11, [bad_option]]},
  263:          {new, [1 bsl 64, []]},
  264: 
  265:          {put, [{atomics, make_ref()}, 1, 42]},
  266:          {put, [Counters, 1, Huge]},
  267:          {put, [Counters, 0, 42]},
  268:          {put, [Counters, 11, 42]},
  269:          {put, [Counters, 0, abc]},
  270: 
  271:          {sub, [{atomics, make_ref()}, 1, 99]},
  272:          {sub, [Counters, bad_index, bad_value]},
  273:          {sub, [Counters, 0, 99]},
  274:          {sub, [Counters, 1, Huge]},
  275:          {sub, [Counters, 11, 99]}
  276:         ],
  277:     do_error_info(L).
  278: 
  279: do_error_info(L0) ->
  280:     L1 = lists:foldl(fun({_,A}, Acc) when is_integer(A) -> Acc;
  281:                         ({F,A}, Acc) -> [{F,A,[]}|Acc];
  282:                         ({F,A,Opts}, Acc) -> [{F,A,Opts}|Acc]
  283:                      end, [], L0),
  284:     Tests = ordsets:from_list([{F,length(A)} || {F,A,_} <- L1] ++
  285:                                   [{F,A} || {F,A} <- L0, is_integer(A)]),
  286:     Bifs0 = [{F,A} || {F,A} <- counters:module_info(exports),
  287:                       A =/= 0,
  288:                       F =/= module_info],
  289:     Bifs = ordsets:from_list(Bifs0),
  290:     NYI = [{F,lists:duplicate(A, '*'),nyi} || {F,A} <- Bifs -- Tests],
  291:     L = lists:sort(NYI ++ L1),
  292:     do_error_info(L, []).
  293: 
  294: do_error_info([{_,Args,nyi}=H|T], Errors) ->
  295:     case lists:all(fun(A) -> A =:= '*' end, Args) of
  296:         true ->
  297:             do_error_info(T, [{nyi,H}|Errors]);
  298:         false ->
  299:             do_error_info(T, [{bad_nyi,H}|Errors])
  300:     end;
  301: do_error_info([{F,Args,Opts}|T], Errors) ->
  302:     eval_bif_error(F, Args, Opts, T, Errors);
  303: do_error_info([], Errors0) ->
  304:     case lists:sort(Errors0) of
  305:         [] ->
  306:             ok;
  307:         [_|_]=Errors ->
  308:             io:format("\n~p\n", [Errors]),
  309:             ct:fail({length(Errors),errors})
  310:     end.
  311: 
  312: eval_bif_error(F, Args, Opts, T, Errors0) ->
  313:     Module = counters,
  314:     try apply(Module, F, Args) of
  315:         Result ->
  316:             case lists:member(no_fail, Opts) of
  317:                 true ->
  318:                     do_error_info(T, Errors0);
  319:                 false ->
  320:                     do_error_info(T, [{should_fail,{F,Args},Result}|Errors0])
  321:             end
  322:     catch
  323:         error:Reason:Stk ->
  324:             SF = fun(Mod, _, _) -> Mod =:= test_server end,
  325:             Str = erl_error:format_exception(error, Reason, Stk, #{stack_trim_fun => SF}),
  326:             BinStr = iolist_to_binary(Str),
  327:             ArgStr = lists:join(", ", [io_lib:format("~p", [A]) || A <- Args]),
  328:             io:format("\n~p:~p(~s)\n~ts", [Module,F,ArgStr,BinStr]),
  329: 
  330:             case Stk of
  331:                 [{Module,ActualF,ActualArgs,Info}|_] ->
  332:                     RE = <<"[*][*][*] argument \\d+:">>,
  333:                     Errors1 = case re:run(BinStr, RE, [{capture, none}]) of
  334:                                   match ->
  335:                                       Errors0;
  336:                                   nomatch when Reason =:= system_limit ->
  337:                                       Errors0;
  338:                                   nomatch ->
  339:                                       [{no_explanation,{F,Args},Info}|Errors0]
  340:                               end,
  341: 
  342:                     Errors = case {ActualF,ActualArgs} of
  343:                                  {F,Args} ->
  344:                                      Errors1;
  345:                                  _ ->
  346:                                      [{renamed,{F,length(Args)},{ActualF,ActualArgs}}|Errors1]
  347:                              end,
  348: 
  349:                     do_error_info(T, Errors);
  350:                 _ ->
  351:                     Errors = [{renamed,{F,length(Args)},hd(Stk)}|Errors0],
  352:                     do_error_info(T, Errors)
  353:             end
  354:     end.
